segment.source: Samples and libraries to help you build great Xbox One and TV experiences.
segment.target: Samples and libraries to help you build great Xbox One and TV experiences.

segment.source: TVHelpers is a set of JavaScript and XAML/C# samples and libraries to help you build great Xbox One and TV experiences in JavaScript and C#.
segment.target: TVHelpers is a set of JavaScript and XAML/C# samples and libraries to help you build great Xbox One and TV experiences in JavaScript and C#.

segment.source: TVJS is a library that helps you build premium UWP apps for Xbox One.
segment.target: TVJS is a library that helps you build premium UWP apps for Xbox One.

segment.source: TVJS includes support for automatic controller navigation, rich media playback, search, and more.
segment.target: TVJS includes support for automatic controller navigation, rich media playback, search, and more.

segment.source: You can use TVJS with your hosted web app just as easily as with a packaged web UWP app with full access to the Windows Runtime APIs.
segment.target: You can use TVJS with your hosted web app just as easily as with a packaged web UWP app with full access to the Windows Runtime APIs.

segment.source: For more information, see the TVHelpers project and the project wiki.
segment.target: For more information, see the TVHelpers project and the project wiki.
